official_title: To amend chapter 15 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the provision prohibiting certain State and local employees from seeking elective office.
short_title: State and Local Employees Bill of Political Rights

summary.text: State and Local Employees Bill of Political Rights - Amends Federal law (Hatch Act) to repeal the prohibition against a State or local employee's seeking elective office.

titles.title: State and Local Employees Bill of Political Rights
To amend chapter 15 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the provision prohibiting certain State and local employees from seeking elective office.
